caseTitle: Collector Customs, Model Customs Collectorate, Jamrud Peshawar v. Muhammad Ismail and others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 155, 157, 168, 2(s), 180, 16 of the Customs Act, 1969 & Section 3 of the Import and Export (Control) Act, 1950.   (2) The show cause notice is issued to provide opportunity to defend but no notice was issued to the owner of vehicle which violated the principle of natural justice and due process
